C

Character - Class in Run4YourBits
This class defines the behavior of the main avatar and its different animations, it also includes the score,speed and the multiplier variables.
Character(String, String, String, int, int, String, String, int) - Constructor for class Run4YourBits.Character
Constructs a character based on input
checkCollisions(Character, MultithreadSystem, Thread, String, Background) - Method in class Run4YourBits.Checkpoint
Checks for collisions and acts accordingly
checkCollisions(Character, MultithreadSystem, Thread, String, Background) - Method in class Run4YourBits.HighObstacle
Checks whether the obstacle has collided with the avatar and takes action
checkCollisions(Character, MultithreadSystem, Thread, String, Background) - Method in class Run4YourBits.LowObstacle
Checks whether the obstacle has collided with the avatar and takes action
checkCollisions(Character, MultithreadSystem, Thread, String, Background) - Method in class Run4YourBits.Obstacle
Calls the checkCollisions method in each type of obstacle in order to check whether the obstacle has collided with the avatar and takes action
checkCollisions(Character, MultithreadSystem, Thread, String, Background) - Method in class Run4YourBits.PowerUp
Checks whether the avatar has collided with the Power-Up and takes action
